text: Tara Lyn Strong (born Tara Lyn Charendoff born February 12, 1973) is a Canadian and American actress. She is known for her role as Ben Tennyson from Ben 10, Twilight Sparkle from My Little Pony, Timmy Turner from The Fairly OddParents, Daizy from Wow! Wow! Wubbzy!, Honey from Camp Lazlo, Princess Unikitty from Unikitty! and Dil from Rugrats. == Early life == Strong was born on February 12, 1973, in Toronto, Ontario. Her father, who is Jewish, is from Toronto. Her mother who is Jewish, is from Toronto of Russian descent. == Personal life == She married to Craig Strong in 2000. They have two sons: Sammy (born 2002) and Aden (born 2004). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian singers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Comedians from California
title: Tara Strong
